WRITING.TEXT: I seem to have a very infectious energy pull. All my partners have always been unnecessarily high energy and being on the opposite end I mellow them out. Most of the dates I #8217;ve had were at home just watching tv. It seems to make guys get very comfortable confiding in me and trusting me faster leading to more meaningful conversations. So far only perks for them.

Being funny without being too corny. Most importantly read her body language. Sometimes we are polite yet so uncomfortable and you wouldn #8217;t know coz we may be smiling (forced smile mind you). If she doesn #8217;t keep the convo going, move on bro.

It #8217;s been a while but one time I was chit chatting about my new snowboard and how excited I was to break it in with a coworker and we are both not white. A new colleague (White girl) whom I was training interrupted me to say black people don #8217;t go in snow. I was speechless: my jaw dropped, my eyes wide in surprise at this blatant racist standing before me. I didn #8217;t finish training I simply walked away.
I cuddle a teddy bear in the darkness of my home. Somehow that seems to work, depressing but effective.

My biggest fear used to be things going wrong. As a perfectionist I hated not having everything work out exactly as planned. But once I started solo travels I found that I am actually very relaxed when abroad. I will plan and over plan but once I get to my destination I usually throw out those plans and go with the flow. In Ireland I found myself stuck in a bar without any taxis to go home but because I had been friendly to a local farmer he offered me a ride home and even showed me how to work the turf fire in the traditional home I was renting. I also got a free tour of the region the next day. I #8217;ve met other travelers and joined up with them for a day or two just because. Always be aware of your safety but don #8217;t be overly cautious to the point you are denying yourself an opportunity to meet sweet people.

I #8217;m probably the wrong person to ask coz I always overpack. I have an airline credit card that allows me to carry 2 bags weighing 70lbs each so I take full advantage of that. My rationale on that is that I #8217;m on vacation and don #8217;t want to be regretting leaving behind the perfect fashion piece for the day. So I pack enough for 3-4 outfit changes daily. I never worry about having to wash nothing and most of the time I can wash all those clothes on my last vacation day coz I always stay in rented homes so I can feel like a local. Do what feels right for you whether it be an overpacker or a minimalist. It #8217;s your trip. Shape it your way.

I love watching sad movies coz then it opens up those darn blocked tear ducts. An alternative I accidentally found works for my warped brain is to watch comedy. I end up laughing so hard which then morphs into maniacal cackling and the not so happy tears start flowing. Best part about the laugh cry is you can do it in public because most people will just think it #8217;s a good laugh but deep inside you know.

Back when I first started I could never leave my own room when astral projecting and then one day I sat up and out of my body and my guide was like #8220;no, not today. #8221; And immediately he gently guided me back to my body. Perhaps you just met your guide. I knew he was my guide because he came to me the night before in a dream so when he showed up that night I wasn #8217;t shitting bricks at having an entity in my room. I should have listened. My dumbass tried to return the next day but got yanked out by a demon. I was terrorized for months to the point I couldn #8217;t go to sleep coz I knew he would pull me out the moment I closed my eyes. Listen to your guide whether or not you see them, they are telling you you #8217;re not in the right headspace to be getting out.

Absolutely, it #8217;s the best therapy. It sucks at moments when you are traveling and see other couples but then you get that euphoric feeling of freedom and a new perspective. I think of it as pressing the reset button and so when I get home I am no longer moping for them as I #8217;ve scrubbed them free from my life.

I dated a guy long distance who was the sweetest. We would both do homework while FaceTiming each other in college and help each other out. I fell asleep on multiple occasions and I #8217;d wake up to see him still on the line but playing video games. It was intimate moments like that that made the distance issue seem momentarily forgotten.

I had a similar situation happen where I was basically your friend and I cut him off too. But obviously the friendship meant too much to me and I tried to reconnect and he no longer wants anything to do with me. From mutual friends I heard that he was too heartbroken and would prefer never to see me again. It hurts to lose a friend but save your heart and cut her out too. I have recovered and so will she. Choose your happiness first as opposed to pining after her.

I #8217;ve failed 16 times when I was a teenager. It got to a point I would sometimes forget I #8217;d tried to kill myself the night before and I #8217;d go to school but then collapse in class from the effects of my chosen method. This would freak out my teachers and I #8217;d be rushed to hospital where I would stay for a month. I #8217;ve finally stopped trying now that I know I wasn #8217;t meant to take my own life. The thoughts are still there I just am not motivated enough to suffer another failure.

I try to avoid my triggers. The only bad thing is I get triggered by happiness. So when I #8217;m in a great mood and all smiley and shit I start freaking out because I know sooner or later I will be feeling suicidal. It #8217;s warped. I hate being so happy that I feel that that is the perfect ending of a pathetic life. It never goes away. You just have to let the episode pass and move on.

I never received my card. I couldn #8217;t be bothered. When I choose to work in the evening I make a minimum of $50. I never pursued the card route after finding out I #8217;d have to wait for orders forever.

I #8217;d tell my young naive self not to sleep with that sleazeball and most importantly to have applied to Cambridge or Oxford. I failed to go to college as my parents told me when I come to America I will be accepted to any college. Little did I know they meant community college and working full time to support myself. Having gone to British schools growing up my grades were top notch I #8217;d have been accepted no doubt.
Orgy. Absolutely horrendous. It was a drug and alcohol fueled night with porn actors/actresses. If we were all a little bit sober it would have been enjoyable.

One Mexican. The end. I don #8217;t know why other women start getting jealous of me or suspicious when I #8217;m around their SO. I #8217;m not even pretty, maybe cute like a kitten. Yet all my female friends have cut me off due to their insecurities. I wish we could start loving each other rather than viewing others as threats.

Keep on keeping on. I motivate myself with stupid things coz god knows I #8217;m always on the edge ready to fling myself into oblivion. Today my motivation to wake up tomorrow is I am craving a mango and I get to buy one tomorrow and it will be soft, juicy, and it will run down my arms as I scarf it down and not regret it even when it stains my white shirt which I have just washed. Sometimes there #8217;s no bigger picture, there #8217;s no big reason, not all of us can have an epiphany on why we exist. But just chug along for the ride just for the hell of it coz why not.

It #8217;s not about the method. You need healing. Fuck the stupid system they don #8217;t give a shit. Find the healing within. I #8217;ve tried to kill myself over a dozen times and a dozen times I #8217;ve woken up in hospital and later transferred to a psych hospital. Those were my most favorite vacations growing up. I even celebrated Halloween in a psych ward and yes they gave us costumes and candy. What that taught me was that I crave that childlike giddiness which was so forcefully ripped from my hands. Childhood trauma forced me to grow up before I could even write. So now I tap into my inner child: I have crayons and a coloring book to help me when I #8217;m hurting and unable to cope with living.
My SO had a crush on my best friend and bought her gifts when I never got anything from him the entire relationship. Needless to say he #8217;s an ex.
He got too involved with my life and judging my vices. It was a dark period for me and he probably was being genuine but it felt like I was disappointing a parent.

Liver damage here I come. Bro I hope you got help. You may not feel it and next thing you are on the ground passed out not dead. Trust me I #8217;ve been there. Going a whole month on liquid is still my worst memory.
I #8217;ve always said my stints in hospitals were always my happiest vacations.

I was at work one day talking to my equally young looking colleague #8212; I was 22 and she was 30 #8211; this older gentleman with a southern accent was staring at us and exclaimed #8220;aren #8217;t there some child labor laws preventing you from working or are y #8217;all job shadowing your parents. #8221; He thought we were 12! Made my day lol.
Don #8217;t know why but all the big tips I #8217;ve gotten were from people in downtown Burbank. I avoid Hollywood like the plague.
I fly exclusively with Delta. I even have their credit card. I can always rely on Delta with on time flights, not getting bumped off, and they have a killer lounge everywhere I go.

I had a friend stay with me once and it #8217;s so weird having him there made my cold lifeless place feel like home. Lights got turned on (I never turn on lights coz I don #8217;t want to see how pathetic my life is), blinds opened, fridge was packed with food (as opposed to condiments reigning supreme in there), and it motivated me to get my shit together. Now if only I can tap into that human element when I #8217;m by myself.

I just had a rage episode where I almost got myself and another person killed with my reckless driving. PSA DO NOT DRIVE ANGRY. It has been a good 7 years since my last episode. I turn the music up and shut everyone out and count backwards. Find your technique to walk yourself back to the safe zone.
I felt like I was with a child. Disgusting. I always walk out of those situations with mamas boys. it #8217;s hard to respect someone who still has the training wheels on y #8217;know.

I ran a red light and hit another car. No injuries to the other party though I was unconscious for hours. Worst part is that didn #8217;t stop me from being reckless again. Alcohol is so dangerous and I #8217;m so glad I found weed to replace it. It could be worse. Thank goodness you came out alive. Don #8217;t stay mad at yourself we already suffer enough to think about the past obsessively.

Bro I cannot even handle 25mg. Be smart and don #8217;t fuck yourself up like that. My first time I took 80mg despite being told not to do that and I could see stars shining through my ceiling and I felt like I was dying. Play it safe bro. It #8217;s tempting to want more but trust me when it kicks in in an hour or two, you #8217;ll be regretting that shit.
What a beauty!

It depends on your body. Start small and work your way up. When I did 80mg I had to call off work coz I couldn #8217;t move. Worst part is I called them twice having forgotten I #8217;d already called smh

No. I know I #8217;d want to use that service. Imagine the number of depressed people who would die for no reason! I know we all have a purpose even though not everyone realizes theirs during their lifetime. L

Nope ask/force to change medicine. I had this effect and it also numbed my tongue. I told my doctor and she #8217;s like it #8217;ll go away. I then fainted in front of her since my tongue had swollen and blocked my airway. I don #8217;t play around with seemingly insignificant side effects. Change before it escalates to a potentially fatal effect.
Why not just buy from the dispensary?

Call support. I was in a richy rich area delivering alcohol but the service was absolute shit and it took forever to identify with ID. He was bitching and asking me to just let them start (it was a party) and I backed away telling him to be patient or else I #8217;m driving off. Don #8217;t take that bullshit from people. This job is already dehumanizing enough don #8217;t let entitles pricks bully you.
Happy Birthday!
I just call the merchant line and they #8217;ll transfer me from there. For some reason they don #8217;t wanna give out the number: (888)815-7726

WRITING.TITLE: What should I do?
WRITING.TEXT: So I was in Hollywood about to deliver an order in an apartment when I saw a guy walking up and down the street pulling in car doors. No way am I getting my car stolen or vandalized for $4 so I called the customer to explain and he bitched saying he is paying to have the food be delivered straight to his door. I was polite and told him I am patiently waiting for him at the front of the complex. He huffed and hung up and lo and behold it was a buff Russian guy moaning about reporting me. I #8217;m thinking of just calling support just to cover my behind. What do y #8217;all think?
Yes just did get someone in under a minute! They told me it #8217;s okay I did the right thing and I won #8217;t be deactivated or reprimanded. Sigh of relief.
Dude sorry. Don #8217;t worry you #8217;ll get yours.
You got this bro.
My fwb and I always get super high and watch horror movies. Gotta love the delayed responses lol. I wish I had a pet, enjoy your date with the cat. Bonus point you get to cuddle :)

An edible high is so different since it needs to be digested. I #8217;ve been smacked 3hrs later and thanked myself for waiting it out. They be slow creeping up to ya so I agree with PrehistoricCowlic.

I no longer cut but I have scars that won #8217;t go away and very obviously self harm scars. If you aren #8217;t comfortable telling them why then lie. They know it #8217;s a lie but they understand that I don #8217;t want to talk about it. You don #8217;t have to explain yourself to nobody. We all know we shouldn #8217;t do it but we also don #8217;t need to hear all that judgmental crap from well meaning strangers, friends, and/or family.
So not creepy...
Oh ok thanks for clarifying bro. Sorry for coming off rude. Thanks I #8217;ll definitely try that tomorrow.
Perhaps others can but to me it looks like a dementor sucked the soul out of my body. AP isn #8217;t for me but it can be a very positive experience if you are in the right headspace.
I #8217;m in the same boat but there #8217;s usually fries that I can nibble on. My partner usually gets to feast on the burger. Don #8217;t know why but all cancelled orders for my have been burgers

First time I got that was for a guy who wrote call me when you arrive. I did and he kept hanging up. After a few minutes I started the timer. The timer was at 20 seconds left when the jerk face decided to show up and ask me why I didn #8217;t call!

Doesn #8217;t matter if you #8217;ve been married to him for 20 years. You gotta wait for them to be ready to tell you. Some people might wanna leave that in the past and if you asked you would be opening wounds that had been precariously closed with a lot of effort. You are well meaning which I appreciate but it #8217;s too deep of a topic to be brought up out of nowhere.

No don #8217;t ask questions. I #8217;ve only had one SO who knew the right thing to do: he kept shut and if I ever opened up he would say #8220;I #8217;m so glad to be here with you right now. #8221; You are more than welcome to issue small reassurances but please be content with the little he shares, let him set the pace and if he shuts down don #8217;t revive that conversation. Have a beautiful day.

I believe he trusts you enough to even let you know of the attempt. You are really quite sweet and thoughtful and I wish you happiness. Don #8217;t worry, he knows you care and you can rest assured he will open up if he feels like crossing that bridge.
The Alchemist by Paulo Coelho never fails to trigger my yearning to travel. Oh how much I wish I was a young shepherd traveling with my flock in Andalusia!

On the contrary it #8217;s the only time I can watch such videos. Last night I was watching a bunch of car crash videos on YouTube and I was really relaxed. When sober I couldn #8217;t watch it due to my anxiety levels skyrocketing.

First of all, Happy Birthday. I #8217;m the queen of introverts so every year I leave the country during that time so I can avoid getting disappointed. I give myself the gift of peace. Seriously though don #8217;t sweat it and just go with the flow. Indulge yourself.

Yes I usually smoke socially on weekends but take edibles during the day. If I have a busy day I #8217;ll pop one popcorn ~10mg daily. My tolerance is really low so that one pop keeps me buzzing for hours.

I have had a hard time with the #metoo movement as it #8217;s only been 3 years and I #8217;ve not gone to a therapist. I have even cut back on alcohol because every time I get drunk I get intense flashbacks (I was drunk when it happened). I know therapy is necessary but ignorance is bliss rn. I #8217;m not mentally prepared to rip off the duct tape and properly suture the gaping hole. I #8217;ve found myself to dissociate whenever the topic comes out: my ears ring and drown out the topic, my eyes blur. Needless to say, social media kills me coz I find myself paralyzed when I pass a post on it. Happy recovery y #8217;all.
How does one sign up? I don #8217;t see it in the app.

Last year I skipped my placebo pills on birth control to delay my period due to a tropical vacation I didn #8217;t wanna ruin. But if not I #8217;d recommend using menstrual cups and SheThinx underwear. I get very heavy days but since my switch I can go 6 hours without blinking. Plus it helps when you are someplace without trash cans and don #8217;t need to dispose hygiene products. Good luck hun.

Lol you #8217;d more than cry. Even with 10% of that I was convinced I could see my body drying and my couch was slowly engulfing me into my final resting place. Scary doesn #8217;t even describe it lol.

No offense but your mum sounds like a right c*nt. I used to cut in the car when my mum drove me to school and she #8217;d be like #8220;don #8217;t get blood on my seats. #8221; That #8217;s what a narcissist is like and sadly for both of us that #8217;s what we have as our birth givers. Sorry mate. Hope you don #8217;t scar.

Hey it #8217;s okay. Yes the guilt, the heartbreak, the shame will feel like you are suffocating but it goes away. As a college dropout child prodigy I know how you feel. I found out I #8217;m happier now when I #8217;m not trying to live a life that others (parents) want to vicariously live through me. Cheers mate, you #8217;ll be okay.

lol this is the exact reason I stay away from the kitchen when I get the munchies. I either keep the snacks in the living room or go to 7-11. My high ass would burn the complex to the ground if I didn #8217;t set rules for myself lol.
Hell yeah. Have a good ass time bud.

I #8217;m the richest person alive when traveling. Not really but I definitely throw money away that I #8217;d never do at home as I live a very frugal life. But for some reason traveling makes me let loose and I only start regretting when I touch back at home base. But at the end of the day I tell myself a splurge doesn #8217;t hurt me if it #8217;s localized to traveling and not an every day vice. Happy travels y #8217;all.

Classical music gets me specifically the Brandenburg Concerto No. 2 in F major. I used to play several instruments when I was growing up so classical music is super nostalgic for me. I love feeling (yes feeling, not hearing) each instrument playing nice with the others and occasionally busting a solo move lol. When it gets too intense and my heart beat matches the music I close my eyes and drift off to la la land.

Start seeing a therapist. My parents never took me serious one bit even when they were told. It was an inconvenience to them. If you feel they #8217;ll be that way just get your problems addressed so at least you can get that stability back into your life and not be taken over by the thoughts.

I think you #8217;ll be alright. I can #8217;t stand to see food waste. My ex was the worst he #8217;d bite a burger and be done with it. I am vegan but food waste breaks my heart after growing up surrounded by poverty and hunger. Therefore I often ate his leftovers that would otherwise be trashed after apologizing and saying a little prayer to the poor animal. It #8217;s hard for me since I can literally taste the death.

I agree I used to love youth psych ward it was like a mini vacation. All the ones I went to had levels you were encouraged to work on for perks. They keep you busy with games and arts and crafts and of course group therapy sessions. I loved movie nights. Good job working on your mental health.

WRITING.TITLE: Just got one tip from March and another from April!
WRITING.TEXT: Total amount $4.22. I love the customers and their cheap ways. Why even bother tipping so little when both orders were over $50 each smh. But on the bright side I now have enough money to put a gallon of gas yay!
Hell yeah now you got half a gallon of gas for 2 deliveries. lol but seriously though this company is tripping for making us rely on tips yet many people are cheapskates. I feel your pain.

It #8217;s a slap in the fucking face getting chump change. I remember a few years back on Christmas Day my lonely ass ordered pizza and it was a new kid delivering for the first time. I tipped him $5 and his face lit up. I said fuck it I #8217;m gonna make his night and dropped a $20 in his pocket. He deadass came back with a small gift for me. I #8217;m the working class so I feel the pain and definitely wanna help each other y #8217;know. It doesn #8217;t hurt being kind.

You #8217;ll get through this. Breakups are never easy. I #8217;m sorry it ended. Trying to stay friends is about the worst thing you can do. I #8217;ve also tried and failed that route. Yes I did. That #8217;s only because my principal was very much invested in seeing me succeed and she knew about my depression and suicide attempts.
